p: One CTU reported pandemic or epidemic prior to January 2020 mentioned in their risk assessment at both trial and management level. Three CTUs (17%) reported mention of pandemic or epidemic in their risk assessment prior to January 2020 but only at the management level. The remaining 14/18 (78%) CTUs did not mention pandemic or epidemic in their risk assessment prior to January 2020. This data is illustrated in FigureÂ 5.
